sourcesContent:
import './company-update-coupon.css' import history from '../../../../../../history' import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' import { getToday } from './../../../../../../../../utils/dateUtil' import CompanyService from '../../../../../../../../services/user-services/CompanyService' export default function CompanyUpdateCoupon(props) { let valid = true let currentRef if (!props.values.checked[0]) { valid = false history.push("/company/my-coupons") } else currentRef = props.couponsRef.current[props.values.checked[0]].current const closeDiv = () => { if (window.confirm('Are you sure you want to close this window?')) history.push('/company/my-coupons') } const handleSubmit = (values) => { CompanyService.createCoupon( currentRef.children[0].id, values.amount, values.category, values.description, values.endDate, values.startDate, values.price, values.image, values.title ).then( () => { alert("The coupon was updated successfully.") history.push('/company/my-coupons') window.location.reload() }, error => { if (error.response.data.response) { if (error.response.data.errorCode === "CPN-002.002") alert("You already own a coupon with the title: \"" + values.title + "\"\nPlease choose a different title.") else setTimeout(() => { alert("Action Failed\n" + error.response.data.response) }, 0) return } if (error.response) { setTimeout(() => { alert("Login expired, please login again.") }, 0) window.location.reload(); } else setTimeout(() => { alert("Servers are currently down, try again later.") }, 0) }) } const getBody = () => { if (valid) return ( <>
Update An Existing Coupon
{({ values }) => (
{/* ------------------------------From:------------------------------ */} {/* ------------------------------To:------------------------------ */}
From: To:
Title
Description
Category
Image URL
Price
$
Amount
From:
To:
Date
Price
$
From:
To:
)}
) else return (<>) } return ( <> {getBody()} ) }
